txt.en:
'[placeholder], it is time for the ritual. Will you accompany me and protect me as I complete it? 

'Your task is to ensure I am interrupted by no one. Especially her three -- you know what, forget I said that.

'When you are ready, let me know, and we shall leave.'
'Kaj means well, if only he had been forthright with me! It seems he is less afraid of mammoths than he is of speaking to a woman whose heart he prizes!'

'Now, I am going to go into the house and... get something. You wait here and make sure no-one else interrupts!

'No, I am not worried. There should be no trouble at all. None.

'Just keep an eye out, that's all.'

<rgb=#FF0000>This is a Solo quest, and cannot be completed with a Fellowship.</rgb>
'I have just spoken to Manu, a respected warrior with an interesting tale....'
Kaj is now prepared to embark upon the Lossoth-ritual he has vowed to complete.
'What in the name of the ice-spirits has Kaj gotten into his head this time?'
Kaj is in Pynti-peldot.\n\nYou should speak with Kaj when you are ready to assist him with his ritual.
Pinja is outside her house at Lumi-talletta, south-west of Pynti-peldot in It√§-ma.\n\nYou should speak with Pinja at once.
